    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_91041</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_91041</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Deux voitures le long d'un tournant</string>
            <string language="en">Two cars around a road turn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Autos um eine Straße Umdrehung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois carros em torno de uma volta da estrada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due automobili intorno ad una girata della strada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο αυτοκίνητα γύρω από μια οδική στροφή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos coches alrededor de una vuelta del camino</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre deux voitures le long d'un tournant. Ceci peut être utilisé dans un exercice sur la lumière et la vision où il faudrait ajouter une légende.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows two cars around a road turn.  This can be used in a labelling exercise on light and vision.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">trajet de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light path</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">propagation rectiligne</string>
            <string language="en">rectilinear propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vision</string>
            <string language="en">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt zwei Autos um eine Straße 
Umdrehung. Dieses kann in einer beschriftenden Übung auf Licht 
und Anblick verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra dois carros em torno de uma 
volta da estrada. Isto pode ser usado em um exercício 
etiquetando na luz e na visão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra due automobili intorno ad una
girata della strada. Ciò può essere usata in un'esercitazione 
identificante su luce e sulla visione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει δύο αυτοκίνητα γύρω από
μια οδική στροφή. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια 
άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος στο φως και το όραμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra dos coches alrededor de una
vuelta del camino. Esto se puede utilizar en un ejercicio de 
etiquetado en luz y la visión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heller Pfad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geradlinige Ausbreitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
